release.new: Color palettes Chroma, Island, Rose, Kingfisher, Bioluminescent, Atlas, Fossil, Alpha, Peach, Jazz, and Polygon added
Interrupt image render process by changing position/resolution
Toggle COLOR -> AUTO to automatically fit colors based on position
Deeper zoom (without textures, up to 1e-12) available on transcendental shapes i.e. Mandelbrot (Power), Clover, Sine 1, Sine 2, Horseshoe Crab, and Kleinian
release.info: Larger menu height when changing texture/shape/palette
